dict.acceptation: 除去，剥去；剥夺；删除；清除，拆除；
长条，条板；带状地带（或森林、湖面等）；（足球队员的）运动服；

sent.orig: Can I dip test strip in milk or strip milk directly onto the test strip runtest?
sent.trans: 是否可以直接将试纸浸入牛奶或把牛奶涂抹到试纸上来测试？

sent.orig: The size and installation of separator strip, narrow cover strip, wide cover strip were narrated.
sent.trans: 叙述了PET片用作齿型分离条、窄封闭条和宽封闭条的尺寸和安装。

sent.orig: The detection of shape of strip is a important segment strip quality detection and shape auto-control.
sent.trans: 板形检测是板带材质量检测和实现板形自动控制的重要环节。

sent.orig: The critical buckling problem of cold rolled strip is studied by using the finite strip method(FSM).
sent.trans: 采用有限条法对轧后带材临界屈曲问题进行了分析。
